sledgehammer.event

Class PlayerEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.event.Event
      • sledgehammer.event.PlayerEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AliveEvent, ChatEvent, CheaterEvent, ClientEvent, ConnectEvent, DeathEvent, DisconnectEvent, HandShakeEvent, PlayerCreatedEvent, PlayerInfoEvent, PostConnectEvent, PVPEvent, RequestChannelsEvent

    public abstract class PlayerEvent
extends Event
    Abstract Event that associates a Player with Player-oriented Events in the Sledgehammer engine.
    Author:
    Jab
